Key Match Events: Miguel Terceros scored the only goal of the match in the 58th minute with an assist from Robson Matheus.
Guillermo Viscarra was named Player of the Match.
H. Cuellar received a red card for a professional foul in the 20th minute.
B. Miranda was substituted in for C. Algarañaz in the 80th minute and received a yellow card for time wasting in the 90' +3 minute.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was held at Estadio Municipal de El Alto in El Alto, Bolivia.
The referee for the match was Wilton Pereira Sampaio.
Bolivia ranked 7th and Colombia ranked 4th in the World Cup Qualification standings at the time of the match.
